content: While we are on the subject of Conspiracy Theories here is my latest about the sudden shift in President Trump attitude about bombing Syria. As the Russian investigation has moved into a higher gear, Putin and the Trump Admin authorised the Syrian chemical attack and called for the tough reaction from the Trump admin to divert attention from the investigation. The acid test if this theory is correct or not is how would it affect the momentum of the investigation and if would it lead to any serious change of heart in respect of the new “Love” relationship with Putin.
